description: Planet Stories Volume 4, Number 6, Spring 1950. Published by Love Romances Publishing Company, Incorporated; 1658 Summer Street, Stamford, Connecticut. Copyright was issued in 1948, but no renewal was recorded, this work is Public Domain under Rule 6 of the Copyright Statutes of the United States. Etext created by Gerard Arthus. This issue was missing the front cover, if someone can send me a better copy I will incorporate it into the work.
